text:
Hi Folks
Need some expert advise
I have my own Website developed on Magento and it has several links for users to download documents.
How do i track who has downloaded what document link using HubSpot

Today I have Google Tag Manager to measure the number of clicks on those links, but I'm not able to associate that with a Contact User

Rookie here, in the shallow waters of the deep dive into developing - apologies in advance. To simply make a POST request, where do I even begin? Is this something I can do in Postman, or something like Visual Studio?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>

My goal is to associate custom objects, and make various requests that would fall in the same scope. Where do I even begin?
<@U02KMQEHVS4> Yeah you would need to use Postman or something similar. I use <https://insomnia.rest/download|Insomnia>
